name: exp3-potentiometer
description: This package.json is used to be the default for all of my Johnny-Five experiments

scripts.start: npm run build && t2 run dist/sensor-input-to-output.js
scripts.start:basic: npm run build && t2 run dist/sensor-basic.js
scripts.start:graph: npm run build && t2 run dist/sensor-graph.js
scripts.start:graph-led: npm run build && t2 run dist/sensor-input-to-output.js

author: Matthew Zygowicz
